author: boudoul
body:
Greetings
this PR is introducing the T6 phase2 Tracker geometry following some mechanics studies towards a more realistic description of the inner Pixel Barrel (changing radii of the inner pixel barrel layers).
Internal reference : phase2 tilted tracker : v6.1.3 / phase 2 pixel : v4.0.4  

Following the comments received in the original PR#20988 , I did create a new scenario in runthematrix, This is the natural evolution of T5 , but I have understood that T5 (used in TDRs) should be kept frozen for some time, therefore T6 has been created, leaving T5 untouched.
The geometry xml files  are exactly the sames as the original PR #20988 .

Please note that since the number of modules is changed in those layers (due to the radius change) , the list of detids should also be taken into account by including this file (external) , see :
https://github.com/cms-data/SLHCUpgradeSimulations-Geometry/pull/9
please do not launch a test without this external file


RunThematrix should be fully in place (hopefully) , workflow for 2023D21 (=2023D17 but with T6) : 212XX  



Modifications:  the raddii of three out of four inner pixel barrel layers 
Before (T5)
r | 29.000 | 70.146 | 117.753 | 157.388 |  
in his geometry (T6)
r | 29.000 | 60.000 | 100.000 | 140.000 |  

all work done by @ghugo83
title: Phase2 Tracker  T6 : New raddii of Inner Pixel Barrel layers
